mailSubject: Updated Checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32)
mailBody:

The JSON file containing the detailed checklist has been securely stored. If you have any further questions or need additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out.
